channel.title: CVE Feed for MERIT LILIN ENT.CO.,LTD. -- P2/Z2/P3/Z3 IP camera firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MERIT LILIN ENT.CO.,LTD. -- P2/Z2/P3/Z3 IP camera firmware

item.title: CVE-2021-30169|2024-08-03T22:24:59.669Z -- merit%20lilin%20ent.co.%2Cltd. -- p2%2Fz2%2Fp3%2Fz3%20ip%20camera%20firmware
item.description: The sensitive information of webcam device is not properly protected. Remote attackers can unauthentically grant user’s credential.

item.title: CVE-2021-30166|2024-08-03T22:24:59.684Z -- merit%20lilin%20ent.co.%2Cltd. -- p2%2Fz2%2Fp3%2Fz3%20ip%20camera%20firmware
item.description: The NTP Server configuration function of the IP camera device is not verified with special parameters. Remote attackers can perform a command Injection attack and execute arbitrary commands after logging in with the privileged permission.

item.title: CVE-2021-30168|2024-08-03T22:24:59.671Z -- merit%20lilin%20ent.co.%2Cltd. -- p2%2Fz2%2Fp3%2Fz3%20ip%20camera%20firmware
item.description: The sensitive information of webcam device is not properly protected. Remote attackers can unauthentically grant administrator’s credential and further control the devices.

item.title: CVE-2021-30167|2024-08-03T22:24:59.549Z -- merit%20lilin%20ent.co.%2Cltd. -- p2%2Fz2%2Fp3%2Fz3%20ip%20camera%20firmware
item.description: The manage users profile services of the network camera device allows an authenticated. Remote attackers can modify URL parameters and further amend user’s information and escalate privileges to control the devices.
